Html:
Hi,

If any one can provide the sample how to change Speed/Tempo for MP3 audio files normally as well as On fly (while audio is playing).

Need algorithm for the same, please I am facing this issue from long back and didn't find solution. I have checked the PracticeCSharp code but my requirements will not match that.

NAudio does not include a pitch shifting algorithm, so you would need to ask on an audio DSP site. I think Practice sharp is probably the best example you will find of how to do this at the moment.

Mark
